channel.title: Mods?
channel.description:
Just wondering here, but does anyone find some of the mods mean?
Debate: Some mods mean? (Yes or No)
[img]http://i34.tinypic.com/1zmmrnt.jpg[/img]
Personally I think some are, but certainly not all.

item.description:

item.title: Mods?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

  1. IRC != forum. It is supervised/moderated in a completely different way and anyone can say anything within reason. Some questions are asked and answered on #moparscape but it is much better if you have a big problem to make a topic on the forums.

  2. This really does not need a topic; if you have a case of a moderator “being lazy” use the complaints thread.

  3. I am only a sectional moderator yet I still have to spend quite a lot of time looking through my sections are moderating it. I cant imagine how much time the moparscape moderators spend!

  4. As said before, Don’t be afraid to use the “Report to Moderator” button!

Read full topic

item.title: Mods?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Fatal Desire:

The point wasnt to say mods dont do there job, because lets face it, they do. I am simply commenting on how some mods can be innapropriate at times even when there not getting asked a question. I know im saying. Since he was a previous mod. He could atleast act like one?

The staff here obviously aren’t ‘suit and tie’ kind of people, they’re in the age group that ranges from 14 to 25. Goofing off is fine as long as they’re still able to moderate.

Read full topic

item.title: Mods?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:21, topic:324310”]No. We have mods that don’t DO ANYTHING, and are extremely rude to players.
Thats why this community doesn’t succeed[/quote]

Wow, you have to be one of the most oblivious people to ever criticize the moderators. I am active almost every single day and deal with any reports that are in the section. As Rich said and I have said in previous posts, REPORT THE TOPICS. Don’t expect us to sit there and roam the boards 24/7 and then complain about it. If you do not like this community, then please feel free to leave. This also isn’t a server, so they are ‘members’, not ‘players’.

You say we don’t do anything, but guess what? As I am posting this message:

8 Posts
8 Topics

In Post Reports(AKA reports we need to deal with.) 6 are not done, which will be soon, and 2 are finished.

4031 Posts
4024 Topics

In Solved Reports, reports we have dealt with or looked into.

With this information, I cannot see how we ‘don’t do our job’.

Yes, I will be rude right now. I cannot stand people who will sit and criticize how we do our job, when they have absolutely no idea what is going on. Also, it’s not very fair to blame the moderators completely on why this community ‘doesn’t succeed’.

the elve age:

Mods don’t correct players, they just lock them, they do not post the rule broken.

This has been brought up between moderators before, and yes, we usually do post the rule broken. Pay more attention please.

Read full topic

item.title: Mods?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:38, topic:324310”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=420711.msg3090367#msg3090367 date=1262837555]
How? You have you guys ever looked at the client hacking sections?
All the useless shit gets thrown in their, like a post about fixing a MODEL, should be in MODEL section, maybe if we had a decent report system, and tutorial system the moderators can actually do their job, with all the mess posted around.

As my point, I haven’t seen any helping into, make you follow rule ## (rule here) and don’t do it again, or you will be warned/banned/muted ect?
[/quote]

Not every moderator roams that section, if a topic is reported, it will be dealt with. You’d be surprised that most of the rule-breaking topics don’t even get reported, and stay open until someone brings it to a moderators attention long after it has been posted.

There is nothing wrong with the report system, and I don’t see a problem with the tutorial section either (I’m against removing the filter, as bullshit tutorials shouldn’t be allowed, anyway).

@the last sentence, what the fuck are you saying?[/quote]

“What the fuck are you saying”

This is what i’m talking about, rude staff.

Sorry, i’m tired and just was mistyping.

Mods don’t correct players, they just lock them, they do not post the rule broken.

Read full topic

As my point, I haven’t seen any helping into, make you follow rule ## (rule here) and don’t do it again, or you will be warned/banned/muted ect?[/quote]

Not every moderator roams that section, if a topic is reported, it will be dealt with. You’d be surprised that most of the rule-breaking topics don’t even get reported, and stay open until someone brings it to a moderators attention long after it has been posted.

There is nothing wrong with the report system, and I don’t see a problem with the tutorial section either (I’m against removing the filter, as bullshit tutorials shouldn’t be allowed, anyway).

@the last sentence, what the fuck are you saying?

item.title: Mods?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:36, topic:324310”][quote author=Rich link=topic=420711.msg3090361#msg3090361 date=1262837091]
A moderators job is to watch over the forum making sure the members are following the rules, so therefore they are doing what they’re supposed to. What’s your point?
[/quote]

How? You have you guys ever looked at the client hacking sections?
All the useless shit gets thrown in their, like a post about fixing a MODEL, should be in MODEL section, maybe if we had a decent report system, and tutorial system the moderators can actually do their job, with all the mess posted around.

As my point, I haven’t seen any helping into, make you follow rule ## (rule here) and don’t do it again, or you will be warned/banned/muted ect?

Shut the fuck up, seriously. There is a lot more done than you think.

Also, they won’t be an asshole to you unless you’re being a fucking moron, like you are now.

Not being rude/immature but what exactly are you doing other then locking a few posts?

Rich has done more than you think and will ever know.

And you my sir, are not in this (not the thread, the convo of me and Rich’)
And i have been here since about a year or 2 of the actual climax of this website.
If you would actually realize whats going on here, then you wouldn’t flame somebody for posting their ideas/questions.[/quote]

If you havent realized Rich is a moderator anymore. Instead of confronting rich about this talk to a moderator.

Read full topic

item.title: Mods?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:26, topic:324310”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=420711.msg3090313#msg3090313 date=1262835081]

All mods play there part in this community and that’s all that matters.

No. We have mods that don’t DO ANYTHING, and are extremely rude to players.
Thats why this community doesn’t succeed
[/quote]

Actually the majority of moderators do moderate and do there jobs, there are hardly any rude moderators they are just getting fed up with all the bullshit they have to go through each day with some idiot who decides to spam the forum, troll, or advertise on the forum thats when they get a bit fustrated.[/quote]

Give me an example of a mod who DOES their job. Newty is commonly active, SilentCj, is very active, other then that, they don’t do their jobs.

If you guys are disagreeing to what a MODERATOR SHOULD do.

Then give me an example of what they should be doing/are doing.

Read full topic
